channel.title: Adding New Areas
channel.description: How do I add areas to blank places on the map? What I mean by this is how would I add grass to an empty area so that I could put objects and npcs there and be able to walk on it.

item.title: Adding New Areas
item.dc:creator: @froggie froggie
item.description:
@froggie wrote:

Make sure you copy landscape.rscd into both your client and the server in order to actually be able to interact with it - this is especially true if you create land where previously there was ocean.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding New Areas
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

load the landcape.rscd and edit. once your done compile the server or replace the landscape.rscd and compress and then log in. walla its there.

Read full topic
